biz.onomato.frskydash.hub

Class FrSkyHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.onomato.frskydash.hub.FrSkyHub

  • public class FrSkyHub
extends java.lang.Object
    responsible for parsing FrSky Hub Sensor Data

      • instance

        private static FrSkyHub instance
        singleton instance

      • hubFrame

        private static int[] hubFrame
        the current user frame we are working on. This is used to pass data between incompletes frames.

      • currentHubFrameIndex

        private static int currentHubFrameIndex
        index of the current user frame. If set to -1 no user frame is under construction.

      • hubXOR

        private static boolean hubXOR
        if on previous byte the XOR byte was found or not

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static FrSkyHub getInstance()

      • extractUserDataBytes

        public void extractUserDataBytes(FrSkyServer paramServer,
                        Frame frame)
        Extract user data bytes from telemetry data frame. This subframe is delimited by the 0x5E byte, included in the frame argument for this method. A single call can contain incomplete user data frames so need to keep track of previous frame also.
        Parameters:
        frame -

      • handleHubDataFrame
